about_the_game:
For Evelyn II continues the story several months after the events of the first game. War has broken out all across Aura and The Watcher Order has gathered in the safety of Whitescar Castle. Blood magic runs rampant and something stirs in the shadows. The Watchers alone stand as a beacon of hope and safety amidst the chaos. This era is closing, and how the future unfolds is up to you.

Dialogue


  • Dialogue drives the narrative, providing context, quests, and choices, while offering insights into the game world's history and culture.
  • Player choices shape the story, enhancing replay value.
  • Cutscenes feature talented voice actors with roles in various AAA games.

Graphics


  • 2D pixel art characters inhabit 3D environments with pixelated textures, blending retro charm with modern design.
  • Characters are animated with vibrant expressions with detailed bust art for the main characters.
  • The seamless integration of 2D and 3D elements create depth and immersion, inviting players to explore every corner of the game world.

Setting


  • Aura, the fantastical realm of Kisuarts games, is a magical world filled with diverse landscapes, ancient lore, and mystical beings.
  • From majestic citadels to treacherous dungeons, players explore its depths, encountering puzzles, foes, and other challenges along the way.
  • With its rich history and endless mystery, the land of Aura provides an immersive setting for unraveling the stories and secrets of the world.

Gameplay


  • Players dive into a first-person perspective battling foes, looting treasures, crafting gear, and mastering magic.
  • Inspired by the PS1 era, the game offers immersive exploration and strategic combat, including stealth mechanics and both melee and ranged abilities.
  • The game also features a range of formidable bosses to challenge the player. These creatures can be found guarding ancient treasures or holding the key to unlocking powerful abilities.

short_description: Embark on a captivating adventure RPG in the magical world of Aura. Rich story, handcrafted environments, classic adventuring, meaningful choices, and retro pixel art. Explore, level up, and immerse yourself in an unforgettable journey where your decisions shape your destiny.
